SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.Network

Interface IGameObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualView
public interface IGameObserver
The interface implemented by the virtual view that defines the methods use dby the virtual view to receive information from the game and send them to the client

  • Method Details

    • receiveNumPlayers

      void receiveNumPlayers(int numPlayers)
      It receives the number of players from the game and sends it to the client
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players

    • receiveListPlayers

      void receiveListPlayers(ArrayList<Player> players)
      It receives the players from the game and sends their nicknames to the client
      Parameters:
      players - players of the game

    • receiveCommonGoals

      void receiveCommonGoals(ArrayList<CommonGoal> commonGoals)
      It receives the common goals from the game and sends them to the client
      Parameters:
      commonGoals - common goals of the game

    • receivePersonalGoal

      void receivePersonalGoal(PersonalGoal personalGoal)
      It receives the personal goal from the game and sends it to the client
      Parameters:
      personalGoal - personal goal

    • receiveListBookshelves

      void receiveListBookshelves(ArrayList<Player> players)
      It receives the bookshelves from the game and sends them to the client
      Parameters:
      players - players of the game; from the players, their bookshelves are obtained

    • receiveAllowedPositions

      void receiveAllowedPositions(ArrayList<Position> positions, Board board)
      It receives the positions of the tiles that can be selected from the game and sends them to the client
      Parameters:
      positions - the positions of the tile already selected
      board - the board of the game

    • receiveBoard

      void receiveBoard(Board board)
      It receives the board from the game and sends it to the client
      Parameters:
      board - the board

    • receiveCurrentPlayer

      void receiveCurrentPlayer(Player player)
      It receives the current player from the game and sends it to the client
      Parameters:
      player - current player

    • receiveHiddenScore

      void receiveHiddenScore(int hiddenScore)
      It receives the hidden score of the player from the game and sends it to the client
      Parameters:
      hiddenScore - the hidden score of the player

    • receiveDoneOrder

      void receiveDoneOrder(ArrayList<Tile> array)
      It receives the order of the tiles picked from the game and sends that the ordering went well to the client
      Parameters:
      array - the array of the tiles in the order specified by the player

    • receiveFinalScore

      void receiveFinalScore(ArrayList<Player> players, Player winner)
      It receives the final score of each player from the game and sends it to the client
      Parameters:
      players - players of the game
      winner - winner

    • receivePickedTiles

      void receivePickedTiles(Player player)
      It receives the picked tiles from the game and sends them to the client
      Parameters:
      player - player who has picked the tiles

    • receiveSelectedTiles

      void receiveSelectedTiles(Player player)
      It receives the tiles selected by the players from the game and sends them to the client
      Parameters:
      player - player who has selected the tiles

    • receiveTimer

      void receiveTimer()
      It receives the starting of the timer from the game and sends a message, specifying that the disconnection timer has started, to the client

    • receiveDisconnection

      void receiveDisconnection(String s)
      It receives the nickname of the player who disconnected from the game and sends it to the client
      Parameters:
      s - nickname of the disconnected player

    • receiveCurrentScore

      void receiveCurrentScore(Map<String,Integer> map)
      It receives the current score of each player from the game and sends it to the client
      Parameters:
      map - a map between the nicknames of the players and theirs current scores

    • receiveFirstPlayer

      void receiveFirstPlayer(Player p)
      It receives the first player from the game and sends his nickname to the client
      Parameters:
      p - first player
